definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to comfort oneself/to console oneself/to reassure oneself

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因为你愿意花费无数的夜晚去安慰他们？

sentences.english: Has the purple devoted to encourage and comfort can only temporarily soothe her injured heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾紫陌的鼓励和安慰也只能暂时稍稍安抚她受伤的心。

sentences.english: Placebos work, doctors believed, because the mind is a powerful thing.
sentences.chinese: 医生们相信安慰剂起作用，是因为念力是一种力量。

sentences.english: I take much solace in the fact that she has been recovering from her stroke.
sentences.chinese: 她中风后一直在康复中，这让我大感安慰。

sentences.english: Like before, government officials will speak to boost market sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 像以前一样，政府官员会出面安慰市场情绪。

sentences.english: From the father comes honour; from the mother, comfort.
sentences.chinese: 荣誉由父赐，安慰由母与。

sentences.english: As soon as the scary music kick in, your date  cuddles closer for comfort.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖音乐一开始，你的约会对象就会抱紧你以求安慰。

sentences.english: His friend tried to comfort him by telling him, “You didn't know she was bad.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友安慰他说，“你不知道她是个坏女孩。”

sentences.english: The sick man found solace in music.
sentences.chinese: 那男病人从音乐中获得了安慰。

sentences.english: We enjoy the adventure, the comfort and the companionship that friendship offers.
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢友谊给我们带来的冒险，安慰和陪伴。

sentences.english: The power of the placebo effect is illustrated in the movie classic, The Wizard Of Oz.
sentences.chinese: 经典电影《绿野仙踪》就是安慰剂效应的有力证明。

sentences.english: Placebos are often overlooked in medical studies.
sentences.chinese: 许多医学研究常常忽略安慰剂的作用。

sentences.english: A lover can never have enough of the solaces of his beloved.
sentences.chinese: 来自所爱之人的安慰再多，情人也不嫌。

sentences.english: "We hardly get sick at all, " Mrs McKamey says hopefully.
sentences.chinese: “我们根本不怎么得病，”麦克康美太太自我安慰说。

sentences.english: Ganymede tried to recollect that it was a man's duty to comfort and console a woman, the weaker vessel.
sentences.chinese: 盖尼末德又拼命记起男人有责任安慰劝解女人。

definition: to talk sb round/to straighten sth out/to enlighten
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
